original_text:
Their roar is like that of the lion,
    they roar like young lions;
they growl as they seize their prey
    and carry it off with no one to rescue.
korean_text: 그들의 부르짖음은 암사자 같을 것이요 그들의 소리지름은 어린 사자들과 같을 것이라 그들이 부르짖으며 먹이를 움켜 가져가 버려도 건질 자가 없으리로다

sentences.original_text: Their roar is like that of the lion
they growl as they seize their prey
and carry it off with no one to rescue
sentences.korean_translation: 구해 줄 사람 없이 그것을 물어간다
